messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Mahana Budget Package.
What does the Mahana Budget Package include?
Can you tell me what's offered in the Mahana Budget Package?
What are the benefits of the Telenor Mahana Budget Package?
The Mahana Budget Package includes 3GB for WhatsApp, 300 on-net minutes, and 10 off-net minutes for Rs. 120 including tax. The package is valid for 30 days and can be activated by dialing *514#.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Mahana Budget Package.
How can I activate the Mahana Budget Package?
What is the method to subscribe to the Mahana Budget Package?
How do I get the Mahana Budget Package?
You can activate the Mahana Budget Package by dialing *514#. The package offers 3GB for WhatsApp, 300 on-net minutes, and 10 off-net minutes for 30 days.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Mahana Budget Package.
Who is eligible for the Mahana Budget Package?
Can all Telenor customers subscribe to the Mahana Budget Package?
What are the eligibility criteria for the Mahana Budget Package?
All Telenor GSM Prepaid customers are eligible for the Mahana Budget Package.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Mahana Budget Package.
How long is the Mahana Budget Package valid?
What is the validity period of the Mahana Budget Package?
For how many days does the Mahana Budget Package remain active?
The Mahana Budget Package is valid for 30 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will receive 3GB for WhatsApp, 300 on-net minutes, and 10 off-net minutes during this period.
